name: Starbase DirectX Scene
description:
A directX 3D scene based on the SpaceX Starbase with advanced features such as Water Reflections, Animated Skybox, Model translation and mouse control. coded fully in C++

For more details please read this report and/or watch the video attached to this page:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1I5_RjZR8ySiStJPO8ntbHrAXh_-7rczD/view?usp=shari...
